If one thing is conformable to another thing, it is in agreement with it: conformable to Some of the things that he was saying were not conformable to common sense. We must make sure that all of the steps we take are conformable with the law.
More examplesFewer examplesThey want to replace the government with one that is more conformable to the country's constitution.The bridge is a vast structure, but it is still conformable to the laws of physics.Everything in the book was conformable to the teachings of Plato.
